title: Predictive Model-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Strengthening Teachers' Imaginative Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic instructional design theories and experience in teaching social studies
context.additional_context: Microlearning content optimized for smartphone-based learning platforms, structured as 15-minute focused training modules

learning_goals: Derive at least three instructional design strategies utilizing predictive model elements (personality, psychological, environmental variables)
Apply imagination transformation strategies five or more times when designing social interaction activities
Develop three or more creative lesson ideas executable in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
